text: Kadipur is a constituency of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly covering the city of Kadipur in the Sultanpur district of Uttar Pradesh, India. Kadipur is one of five assembly constituencies in the Sultanpur (Lok Sabha constituency). Since 2008, this assembly constituency is numbered 191 amongst 403 constituencies. Currently this seat belongs to Bharatiya Janta Party candidate Rajesh Gautam who won in last Assembly election of 2017 Uttar Pradesh Lagislative Elections defeating Bahujan Samaj Party candidate Bhageluram by a margin of 26,604 votes. ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Uttar Pradesh Category:Sultanpur district
title: Kadipur (Assembly constituency)
